Marketing Information: The ViewSonic VA2246m-LED is a 22" (21.5" viewable) widescreen monitor with a LED backlight and a glossy, thin-bezel design ideal for use in the home or at the office. With Full HD 1920x1080 resolution and a 10M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio, the VA2246m-LED delivers stunning brightness and contrast, while a quick 5ms response time ensures crisp pictures and smooth playback. As a complete multimedia package, the display also includes a pair of integrated speakers. VGA and DVI inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional mount flexibility. With a LED backlight and energy-saving Eco-mode, the VA2246m-LED is an environmentally friendly display choice. In addition, a 3-year limited warranty, along with one of the industry's best pixel performance policies make the VA2246m-LED a great value choice for corporate and educational use as well.
